sentences.en: I need a viewfinder to take a photo.
My camera has an optical viewfinder.
sentences.cn: 我这个照相机装有光学取景器.

sentences.en: Over there. I'll just position it through the viewfinder.
sentences.cn: 那边, 我会透过取景器取景.

sentences.en: Place your forehead against the camera and look through the viewfinder.
sentences.cn: 将相机贴在额头,通过取景器观察取景.

sentences.en: Shutter button: When pressed halfway: The LCD panel and viewfinder display appear.
sentences.cn: 快门按钮: 当把快门按钮按下一半位置时,液晶显示屏和取景器显示出现.

sentences.en: Slip the viewfinder cap and shoulder pad onto the strap.
sentences.cn: 把背带穿过取景器盖和肩垫.

sentences.en: The exposure indicator is displayed in the viewfinder display.
sentences.cn: 曝光补偿值将在取景器中显示.

sentences.en: The LCD panel and viewfinder display operate.
sentences.cn: 液晶屏和取景器会显示信息.

sentences.en: The viewfinder image will darken when the previewAE lock button is pressed.
sentences.cn: 当按压预景深自动曝光锁定按钮时,取景器相将变暗.

sentences.en: This accessory adjusts the diopter. Install it on the viewfinder.
sentences.cn: 本附件用于调节视差. 它安装在观景窗上.

sentences.en: Turn off the LCD monitor and use the viewfinder to shoot.
sentences.cn: 关闭LCD显示器,利用探视镜进项拍摄.

sentences.en: While looking through the viewfinder, press the previewAE lock button.
sentences.cn: 观察取景器同事.请按压预景深自动曝光锁定按钮.

sentences.en: You shall hold the viewfinder close to the eye. Understand?
sentences.cn: 你应该把取景器举得紧靠眼睛. 明白 吗 ?

trans.tran_en: the small square of glass on a camera that you look through to see exactly what you are photographing
